text: - All right, hey folks, Emily here.

Today, you are gonna
learn how to get started

So Amazon SageMaker Studio
is a fully managed IDE
for machine learning.
In particular, SageMaker Studio decouples
the UI from all of your applications.

So you can browse foundation
models on SageMaker Studio,

you can explore applications,
you can use Jupyter Lab,

you can use SageMaker Studio
Classic, you can use VS Code,

you can use RStudio,
and many other features
so let's check it out.

you'll see I have my Jupyter
Lab, I have Code Editor,

Within JumpStart you'll see

and then you'll see I have

Mixrtal 8x7B Instruct.

The question about the
